BILL.TITLE: Addition of vitamins and other substances

DEBATE-SPEECH.TEXT: The next item is the report (A6 -0124/2005) by Mrs Karin Scheele, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on the addition of vitamins and minerals and of certain other substances to foods (COM(2003)0671 – C5 – 0538/2003 – 2003/0262(COD)).
